import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[filter,setFilter]=useState('');// Fetch data from the backend
useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/nvd-data/').then(response=>{setData(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error(error);});},[]);// Filter data based on CVE ID or Event Name
const filteredData=data.filter(item=>item.cve_id.includes(filter)||item.event_name.includes(filter));// Prepare data for the bar chart
const chartData={labels:filteredData.map(item=>item.cve_id),datasets:[{label:'Event Name Length',data:filteredData.map(item=>item.event_name.length),backgroundColor:'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)'}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by CVE ID or Event Name",onChange:e=>setFilter(e.target.value),style:{marginBottom:'20px',padding:'10px',width:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:'40px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Event Name Length"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{style:{width:'100%',borderCollapse:'collapse'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{backgroundColor:'#f2f2f2'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:'10px',border:'1px solid #ddd'},children:"CVE ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:'10px',border:'1px solid #ddd'},children:"Event Name"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:filteredData.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #ddd'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:'10px',border:'1px solid #ddd'},children:item.cve_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{padding:'10px',border:'1px solid #ddd'},children:item.event_name})]},item.cve_id))})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
